data.eml:eml: NEW SPECIES OF SPIDERS (ARANEAE) FROM HAINAN ISLAND, CHINA

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Alberto T. Barrion, Aimee Lynn A. Barrion-Dupo, Josie Lynn A. Catindig, Sylvia C. Villareal, Ducheng Cai, Qianhua Yuan, Kong Luen Heong (2016): NEW SPECIES OF SPIDERS (ARANEAE) FROM HAINAN ISLAND, CHINA. UPLB Museum Publications in Natural History 3: 1-103, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.269136
